review.title: “Volunteering at Now I Can Foundation is a blessed experience working with children in need.”
review.pros: Pros – Becoming exposed to a non-traditional physical therapy technique used to help patients with cognitive and neurological diseases. Interacting with young and aspiring children who work hard. Learning to appreciate the knowledge of physical therapists. Admire the experience that the physical therapists have.
review.cons: Cons – It is a non-profit so their budget does not extend to paying their physical therapy aides.
review.advice-to-management: Yes, I would recommend this company to a friend
